page.title: 13WOKINGHAM _ SOCIAL CONCERNS
page.content:
Issues of social concern can encompass all aspects of human life including health, housing, transport, finance, town planning, employment and personal relationships in the Wokingham town area. Reasonable prosperity is observed in many of the population.
Issues of social concern are - A growing number of{elderly people}over the age of 75 years are being cared for by relatives who are themselves over retirement age and needing support. Some elderly owner occupiers are finding increasing difficulty in maintaining their property.{Stress in {family life}can result in family breakdown and there is a marked pattern of{mobility for young families in the town drawn by economic factors.
